Questions.QuestionString: How many type of Engine main bearings:
Answers: Three types of bearing: Roller bearing with alignment and load: axial; Ball bearing and Tapered roller bearing with alignment and load: axial and radial
Three types of bearing: Roller bearing with alignment and load: radial; Ball bearing and Tapered roller bearing with alignment and load: axial and radial
Three types of bearing: Roller bearing with alignment and load radial; Ball bearing and Tapered roller bearing with alignment and load axial

Questions.QuestionString: Engine’s main bearing No.1 and No.1.5 are:
Answers: Oil-damped bearings
Tapered roller type
Ball type bearings

Questions.QuestionString: What kind of bearing is used for bearing compartments (4, 5, 6)?
Answers: Tapered Roller
Ball
Roller
Axial flow, dual-rotor, variable stator, high bypass ratio power plant
Radial flow, dual-rotor, variable stator, high bypass ratio power plant
Axial flow, dual-rotor, geared fan, variable stator, ultra high bypass ratio power plant

Questions.QuestionString: Identify the number of blades in one engine fan set?
Answers: Thirty six (36)
Twenty (20)
Twenty two (22)

Questions.QuestionString: The LPCompressor has how many stages?
Answers: Only one stage
Two stages
Three stages
A single stage fan rotor, 3 stage LP Compressor, 8 stage HP Compressor, 2 stage HP turbine and 3 stage LP turbine
A single stage fan rotor, 3 stage LP Compressor, 9 stage HP Compressor, 2 stage HP turbine and 3 stage LP turbine
A single stage fan rotor, 4 stage LP Compressor, 8 stage HP Compressor, 2 stage HP turbine and 3 stage LP turbine

Questions.QuestionString: The primary structure of the PW1100G-JM engine are:
Answers: FIC (Fan Intermediate Case) and TIC (Turbine Intermediate Case)
CIC (Compressor Intermediate Case) and TEC (Turbine Exhaust Case)
Fan case and TIC (Turbine Intermediate Case)

Questions.QuestionString: The Fan Drive Gear System (FDGS) is made up of:
Answers: A central gear surrounded by three star gears which are supported by journal bearings
A central sun gear surrounded by five star gears which are supported by journal bearings and an outer ring gear
A central sun gear surrounded by five star gears which are supported by an outer ring gear

Questions.QuestionString: What is No. 4 Roller Bearing assembly support?
Answers: The rear of HPT rotor and contains the No. 4 Bearing support, attached to the inner case
The rear of LPT rotor and contains the No. 4 Bearing support, attached to the outer case
The rear of LPT rotor and contains the No. 4 Bearing support, attached to the inner case

Questions.QuestionString: How the Engine main gearbox (MGB) are driven by?
Answers: N1 rotor
N2 rotor via the transfer gear box
The Angle gearbox (AGB) extracts power from HPC and provides it to the MGB through a series of gear shafts

Questions.QuestionString: What is the purpose of Compressor Intermediate Case (CIC)?
Answers: Providing a flow path for engine core airflow coming from the LPC to the HPC
Providing a flow path for engine core airflow coming from the Fan Intermediate Case (FIC) to the LPC
Neither A nor B

Questions.QuestionString: The PW1100G-JM engine’s stage counting is as follows:
How to identify the Fan blade No.1?
Answers: The number is vibro-peened on fan hub platform
The number is vibro-peened on fan blade
The number is vibro-peened on retaining lock ring

Questions.QuestionString: The PW1100G engine unique design features:
Answers: An engine fan separated from the low pressure rotor, so that each module operates at optimal speeds
The engine makes use of a number of composite components including a composite fan blade, to achieve a significant weight reduction
The unique debris rejection system provides the best erosion protection, preventing sand, dirt, and other harmful items from reaching the core

Questions.QuestionString: Which component does help in improving engine performance by reducing fan rotating speed and permitting LPC to higher speed?
Answers: Fan Exit Guide Vane (VIGV)
Variable Inlet Guide Vanes (VIGV)
Fan Drive Gear System (FDGS)

Questions.QuestionString: What is true regarding the PW1100G Fan blades?
Answers: Solid laminate composite structured with titanium strip reinforced on the leading edge
Partially hollow and made of aluminum and a titanium strip is bonded to the leading edge
Partially hollow and made of titanium with a steel strip bonded to the leading edge

Questions.QuestionString: Fan Drive Gear System (FDGS) basically is:
Answers: Worm gearbox
Differential gearbox
Planetary gearbox

Questions.QuestionString: The FDGS is a reduction gear mechanism which comprises of a central sun gear and
Answers: Five planetary gears arranged like a star
Four planetary gears arranged like a star
Six planetary gears arranged like a star
